params.amount: The amount of assets to allocate
params.vault: The address of the vault calling the strategy

estimatedTotalAssets().details: This may include both idle and deployed capital

returns._0: The total estimated value of assets managed by the strategy

report().details: Called by the vault to synchronize accounting and performance metrics

returns.debtPayment: Amount of capital returned to the vault during the report
returns.gain: Amount of profit realized since last report
returns.loss: Amount of loss realized since last report

params.amount: The amount of assets to withdraw

returns.loss: If the strategy cannot return the full amount, returns the shortfall

allocate(address,uint256).notice: Allocate funds from the vault to this strategy

estimatedTotalAssets().notice: Estimate the total assets managed by this strategy

report().notice: Report gains or losses and optionally return funds to the vault

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw a specific amount of assets back to the vault
